sentences.en: Avoid all temptations to oversell yourself but be equally careful not to undersell yourself either.
sentences.cn: 避免过份推销自己,但同样要小心不可低估自己.

sentences.en: Don't undersell yourself at the interview.
sentences.cn: 面试时需充分展现自我。

sentences.en: I think he undersold himself at the interview.
sentences.cn: 我认为他在面试时过于自谦了。

trans.tran_en: to sell goods at a lower price than someone else
